articles.title: Dell launches XPS 13, XPS 15 (2020) in India: Prices start at ₹1.4 lakhs - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The highlight of these new laptops are the Intel 10th-gen Core processors and of course the InfinityEdge display with minimal bezels on all the four sides.
